column4: Eh... I want to do the real install anyway. Ubuntu just won't recognize my fakeRAID
The RAID setup tutorial I saw says to do this:
fdisk -u -l /dev/sda (if sda is not your disk, change it)". I tried that command and got no output like it seemed I was supposed to. How do I know what my disk?
Erm.. what my disk is? So I can change "sda" as needed.
Or, will this command even work from the Live CD?
